remarks: Function-builder for derivative, imaginary part.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dvmptcj.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptcj.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvmptcj.da $e |- ( ph -> ( RR _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptim $p |- ( ph -> ( RR _D ( x e. X |-> ( Im ` A ) ) ) = ( x e. X |-> ( Im ` B ) ) ) $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
